analysis.description:
McFlyCrowd.closeWindow (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#1045-1050) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#1049-1050)

Reentrancy in McFlyCrowd.McFlyCrowd (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#719-816):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(preMcFlyWallet,_preMcFlyTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#773)
	- token.allowTransfer(preMcFlyWallet) (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#774)
	- token.mint(wavesAgent,wavesTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#777-779)
	- token.allowTransfer(wavesAgent) (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#779-780)
	- token.allowTransfer(wavesGW) (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#780-782)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdTokensTLP2 (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#782-783)

Reentrancy in McFlyCrowd.fundMinting (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#926-935):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.totalSupply() + amount <= hardCapInTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#932-933)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- fundTotalSupply (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#933-934)
price in McFlyCrowd.calcAmountAt (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#946) is a local variable never initialiazed

McFlyCrowd.McFlyCrowd (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#719-816) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(preMcFlyWallet,_preMcFlyTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#773)

	-token.mint(this,_advisoryTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#803-804)
	-token.mint(this,_reservedTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#809-810)
	-token.mint(airdropWallet,_airdropTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#812-813)

McFlyCrowd.fundMinting (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#926-935) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(to,amount) (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#934)

McFlyCrowd.getTokens (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#992-1043) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(contributor,amount) (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#1008)

McFlyCrowd.sendTokensWindow (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#1057-1086) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_tempAddr,_tokenToSend) (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#1077-1078)

McFlyCrowd.finishCrowd (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#1094-1105) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(this,_tokenPerWindow.mul(5)) (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#1101)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#1105)

McFlyCrowd.vestingWithdraw (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#1118-1136) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(withdrawWallet,tokenAvailable) (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol)

McFlyCrowd.sendTokensWindow has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(_tempAddr,_tokenToSend) (/unique_contracts/0x6917d70f5622da6b4e88681892444ffdd552df5f.sol#1077-1078)
